channel.title: [vb] Opening an external application?
channel.description:
Hey,
For my game I wan't to create a start up menu where I can post the latest news on the games, and where it will update the game when it needs updating. I am doing this in VB, because blitzbasic just isnt cut out for making a stylish GUI for what I need.
I know how to do the rest of it, but I do not know how to start up my game after that window.
I have a button that is supposed to open up Afelhem.exe, but how do I do this? Er... Well what is the code to open an exe file?

item.title: [vb] Opening an external application?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: [vb] Opening an external application?

item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

Shell "path\file.exe"

Read full topic

item.title: [vb] Opening an external application?
item.dc:creator: @RegeX RegeX
item.description:
@RegeX wrote:

Shell("omfg.exe")

Or something like that

Read full topic
